entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch usage of `CallingConvention` field on `GeneratedDllImport` to `UnmanagedCallConv` attribute #61134
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to await a SynchronizationContext or a TaskScheduler #61133
  • [mono] Create separate yml that can trigger full test runs on demand #61132
    7.0.0
  • Installer test infrastructure around the install_location config file on macOS crashes test process with RC2 SDK #61131
  • Invalid override of protected interface member via regular puplic member #61124
  • Analyzer: Replace occurrences of TypeInfo with Type and TypeInfo.GetTypeInfo() with Type.GetType() #61122
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun, PublishSingleFile=true, net 5.0 / 6.0 leaves native dlls out of bundle container #61120
  • Assertion failed 'm_dst->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT' with COMPlus_JitSkipArrayBoundCheck #61116
  • SslStream.Read behavior changes #61115
  • DateTime.TryParseExact returns false for "945" with pattern "Hmm" #61109
  • C++/CLI assembly is loaded into isolated AssemblyLoadContext (IsolatedComponentLoadContext) in .NET 6 #61105
  • ReadyToRun and Unicode class names #61104
  • [Runtime Store] conflict with dotnet command line #61103
  • [API Proposal]: Add support to override default event provider name for AddEventSourceLogger #61100
  • [API Proposal]: JsonBoolHandling #61097
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Improve handling of OOM #61095
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose a JsonSerializerOptions.Default property #61093
    7.0.0
  • X509Certificate.CreateFromSignedFile fails on Linux with ASN1 corrupted data #61092
  • Increase serialization max size or make it user driven for SystemTextJson #61089
  • A delegate object is created for each IOptionsMonitor<T>.Get call #61086
  • How to use dotnet.js outside of browser? #61083
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest1082\\Generated1082\\Generated1082.cmd #61082
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_26491/GitHub_26491_MultipleReturns/GitHub_26491_MultipleReturns.sh #61081

Closed

  • TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones() returns empty list - Net6 Regression #61127
  • Make QCalls respect EntryPoint #59823
    7.0.0
  • Support reading/writing COSE_Key values #32080
    7.0.0
  • TypeBuilder::GetConstructor and GetField type checks are in the wrong order #45988
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Security.Cryptography test failures #61099
  • [tracking]: Remove SafeFileHandle for Unix #61112
  • [wasm][aot] Link step failing for `System.Text.Json.Tests` - `wasm-opt` getting killed #51961
    6.0.0
  • Dynamic structure alignment by IntPtr.Size #61107
  • System.Memory.Tests failing in checked ARM64 #61084
    7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][arm64] Recognize madd/msub #49283
    7.0.0
  • running AOT on a Blazor WASM app Error on .net Standard 2.0 dll #60612
  • GetAbbreviatedDayName in Portuguese #61088
  • Importing .vsconfig shows an error #60794
  • net6.0-android app crashes in release mode when instantiating HttpClient #60896
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #58235
    7.0.0
  • [Android] Mono runtime should always ask Xamarin.Android to load native shared libraries #37303
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json inconsistent behavior using JsonExtensionData on JsonObject #61080
  • System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.ReadAsync fails to cancel on CancellationToken #58909
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Support DateOnly and TimeOnly members #61098
  • DataMisalignedException thrown when using MemoryMarshal.Cast<byte, double> on correct data #61096
  • ImmutableDictionary.ContainsKey is few times slower than Dictionary.ContainsKey or even ConcurrentDictionary.ContainsKey #29088
    Future
  • ICorProfilerCallback11 typo #60965
    7.0.0
  • Test failure profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.sh #60665
    7.0.0
  • SslStream: Don't include "NT AUTHORITY" in Distinguished Names list of CertificateRequest. #60949
    7.0.0
  • Native dependencies in Blazor WebAssembly - Issue when try use a callback from C++ #60824
  • [Tizen ] X86 Linux CI for pull requests #60452
  • [7.0] microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain\WorkloadManifest.targets hardcodes net6.0 as TFM #60745
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToGeneratedDllImportAnalyzerTests.TypeRequiresMarshalling_ReportsDiagnostic(type: typeof(System.ConsoleKeyInfo)) #60950

PullRequests

Created

  • [DllImportGenerator] Switch away from setting CallingConvention field on GeneratedDllImport #61130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove dead code in jit #61129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate tests with class name 'BringUpTest' #61128
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix setting pipe used in PAL_ProbeMemory as nonblocking #61126
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate runtime tests using the class name 'Test' #61125
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
  • Credential fixes #61114
    area-System.Net
  • Fix value numbering of field assignments #61113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #61111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip sys/sysctl.h on linux in mono #61110
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #61079
    new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Make QCalls respect the EntryPoint property #60992
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add back SoD Blazor Pizza Aot test #61118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid bogus cred scanning hits #61070
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Switch to run only smoke tests per PR for apple mobile configurations #61108
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix: Incorrect order of checks for TypeBuilder `GetConstructor` and `GetField` method #53645
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable failing System.Security.Cryptography tests due to http… #61102
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Disable couple of randomly failing PerformanceCounter tests #61101
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Throwing `FormatException` when a required property from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` is empy #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Fold "A * B + C" to MADD/MSUB #61037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Some VN refactoring #61034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Removed two unused packages from .vsconfig #60798
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Seed the unified System.Security.Cryptography.dll #61025
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #59313
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • revert 58594 CacheCredential change #61069
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Temporarily disable scaled index on arm64 #61090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix typo in profiler method #60999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Fix IsContainableImmed for arm64 v8.1 or higher #61035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add Maui iOS and MacCatalyst build steps #61068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • Make sure smoke tests aren't run on the rolling build #61055

Updated

  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Add TFM and version support query to marshaller interface. #61064
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • JIT: limited version of forward substitution for some relops #61023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] simplify startup configuration #61072
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: addressing modes #61026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix refcount when a composite r2r image is loaded from a bundle #61066
    area-Single-File
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0.1] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.1
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment with Unsafe.StackAlloc<T> #60428
    area-Meta
  • Use SIMD operations in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and increase INITBLK_UNROLL_LIMIT to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove sorting requirement for interface lists #60541
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
